statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, device_id FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, device_id, data FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 1 AND timestamp >= '2021-12-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(jsonb_array_length(data)) AS avg_data_length FROM sensor_data;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*), AVG(jsonb_array_length(data)) AS avg_data_length FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY avg_data_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, installation_date FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity FROM Sensors JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(data_id) AS data_count FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(data_id) > 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, installation_date FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM Sensors WHERE installation_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, recorded_at FROM Sensors JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%kitchen%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, installation_date FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS num_devices FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id, sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT location, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location='Living Room';
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, event, severity FROM monitoring_logs WHERE severity='High' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM monitoring_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_id, message FROM alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_type ASC;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE message LIKE '%critical%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices JOIN sensors ON devices.device_id = sensors.device_id ORDER BY devices.device_name ASC, sensors.sensor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, sensor_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Bedroom' ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(device_id) AS total_devices FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY location HAVING total_devices > 1 ORDER BY total_devices DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%light%' AND location != 'Bedroom';
